name: Searching for Quick Eternal Love!
description:
This game was created as the artefact for a study on feelings of love for fictional characters. 

If you wish to participate in the survey use this link after finishing the game once. https://forms.gle/sgC7i4oYEf4yDQig6

The thesis study is conducted by a student of Game Writing at the University of Skövde in Sweden.
